website_summaries.verdict: A premium gaming chair with unbeatable features.
pros: Wireless sound connection for an interactive audio experience
Features two headrest speakers and built-in sub woofers for bass vibration
Pedestal base tilts backward and sideways
cons: Not the most comfortable option for extended gaming sessions

customer_reviews.title: good but there is 1 add on you will need
customer_reviews.text: Son love it for his xbox one.. however, before you buy this. there is another product you'll need because Xbox One doesn't have RCA jack. You'll need to buy a 38.00 HDMI Audio Extractor. They dont tell you this in the description and that is wrong not to mention that.. But other than that it sounds great and my son now has his Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, TV, and iPhone hooked up to it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex.S

customer_reviews.title: Very poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: WHAT THEY DON'T TELL YOU: the arms are not built to bear any weight. The instructions tell you not to lean on the arms or move/lift the chair using the arms or they will break. The chair is very uncomfortable. Zero lower back support. There is a rod of some sort that will hurt your thighs after about 15 minutes. It barely reclines. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Moore

customer_reviews.title: The chair came defect
customer_reviews.text: The chair leans to one side about 3inches. Not only that, but i cant get audio to the chair. Wireless or wired. The chair got great reviews thats why i got it but i cant give a good review with a defected chair. Hope the pictures help as in the picture is hard to see.. if i can get this problem resolve, i will post a 2nd review with facts. How fast they responded and how the chair is.. dont take this review as a bad review. Lets give them a chance to make it right..
customer_reviews.author: GuNZz

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Whats not to like, speakers near your head, quality comfort with adjusting tilt tightness, vibrating chair with adjustment level for it and the base volume. Did I mention WiFi, just plug the chair in. Lighted volumn dial, all easy to reach. Armrest aren't to high to be in the way, and I love that the chair swivels making it easy to turn and see what my fur babies are up to. Only con, it's a bit heavy and not so easy to move on carpet. Otherwise, a great buy! You'll find yourself feeling more immersed in your game with the speakers so close to your head and the vibrating function. A gamers must have!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This chair is not worth the money. I was not able to get it to play sound anyway except if the chair was plugged directly into the xbox controller but by doing this your headphones don't work. Brought multiple pieces and watched many videos and nothing works. It's old technology as it's not HDMI compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Jah

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, should last longer than a few months!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this chair 7 months. We had to order a replacement chord after about 2 months. The chair is uncomfortable since the back headrest hits about the top of your spine, meaning no support for your lower back. When the speakers stopped working I called Amazon, they said I could have 35% back and that I could use that to "higher someone to fix the chair." I asked who I'm going to have fix a chair for $60?! Of course he had no idea. This chair is a huge waste of money! 😬
customer_reviews.author: Greenley6

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.text: The seat is uncomfortable. The seat and back are not designed well and it has a hump in the middle of the seat. Audio receiver broke within 2 weeks of receipt. Vendor not responsive. Not one phone call was ever returned. Do not support this seller because they won’t support you. Buy from someone else.
customer_reviews.author: q

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, vibration is intense, wireless is awesome, but chair has to be plugged in to wall!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this chair. It is wireless, but the chair itself has to be plugged in! Only downside. It also doesn't rock as much as I thought it would. We took it off the base and he uses it on the ground so he can rock back and forth. I've removed the base and put it back on a few times, so it's kind of versatile, the chair is heavy, but easy to put together. The vibration is pretty intense, wish the volume was a little louder, though. The wireless set up was a little confusing, but after finding other cords in my house to connect it to different systems and TV's we got it working.
customer_reviews.author: rdteem

customer_reviews.title: Was broken from the start
customer_reviews.text: was broken from the start after I put it together and hooked up the electronics I tried to turn it on and it wouldn't turn on I tried several different outlets and it wouldn't turn on so it sucks and gets 1 star would give it 0 if I could
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste the money. Buy direct
customer_reviews.text: First bought and my husband saw a tear in it. It was for his birthday. The tear was very noticeable. Now the speaker piece fell off. He is very protective of his gifts and anything to do with his gaming. No one goes near it so it is strange that this happened. As much as I paid for chair this is crazy how many things were wrong. Next time I will not spend so much on one item from Amazon. Better to buy direct.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: No wireless connection. Armrest heads legs and scratches
customer_reviews.text: The problem is it says it wirelessly connects. And it does not. Also my daughter has received two long bruises on her legs from her leg getting wedged into the arm rest. Which also is sharp on the corners and scratches her leg because she wears short shorts often. We live in Florida. It also does not really recline I did not say that word, but we would want it to.they need to make one that reclines. The base is good. But overall I feel the cushion would wear. It’s been about 2 weeks. For these reasons we are returning.
customer_reviews.author: bella

customer_reviews.title: Good deal high quality!
customer_reviews.text: Vrey good deal for this well design game chair. This material is high quality and the design is very good. Very comfortable . And back and both side have speaker. As a gamer I really like it. Also it is really easy to use. It comes with the audio cable ! Good price and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: KIM LAU

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this chair but it makes an awful skeaking noise when I sit in it. Not a weight limit issue, and I tried to lubricate the where the chair and base connect. I have been trying to reach out to the seller and the contact info they have povided is no good. Website doesn’t work and phone number goes to a voicemail all the time. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Pete O

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so far its working great, though I did buy the 3 v adapter for the wireless sound transmitter.  well month 7 the power went out and stopped working. Youtube has diy videos saying the ac power connections on the circuit board need to be resoldered or warmed up for a solid connection. 8-22-2016 I resoldered the pins onto the circuit board, it works now. I had to desolder and clean the board with 90% alcohol then I scraped some of the green around the loosest pin and soldered. when it cooled I sealed as much of the exposed edges with liquid lock tight. The chair has been working for 2 weeks now with no new or old issues.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca 4*

customer_reviews.title: Gaming chair for the vertically challenged
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking chair, it would be a little nicer with wheels instead of the pedestal base. If you're going to use it to watch movies, or games other than fps, then it's nice. The speakers in the chair cannot beat headphones, you don't know where danger is coming from. Oh, and if you're over 5' 11", maybe even 6', this is not your chair. The neck support will be in the middle of your back. I was really excited about this chair, unfortunately, it didn't work out for me. If you're really short, and don't need to know where the danger is in your game, then this chair will be just fine for you. Live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Freecons

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gaming chair!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is dope! I've had it for about a week now. So far, its comfortable to sit in. The arm rests can get a bit uncomfortable because of the hard material but it's the last of my worries. The chair speakers are loud and interact with games L R audio features (3D audio). The subwoofer is awesome and provides very decent bass. The vibrations are also cool, feels like a massage and very fun in gaming. I love that you can alter the bass, vibration, and volume with knobs. The leather on the back wasnt fully stretched out but again, that's the least of my worries. Overall, absolutley worth 200$.
customer_reviews.author: Raphyy28

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: The volume is extremely low. You can not hear anything coming from the 3 speakers. His headphones are louder. Tried calling customer service but I had to leave a message. Very sad that and disappointed I really wanted this chair to be amazing. I hope if they call me back they can fix they problem. The chair is beautiful and looks like the picture but the sound is extremely low you can’t hear anything
customer_reviews.author: MrzCastro

customer_reviews.title: Very good chair
customer_reviews.text: I have just bought this chair and I love.It is comfortable for hours and the sound is great. Some people say u need an hdmi adapter to hook it up to ps4,but you don't. All I did was look it up on YouTube and it worked fine with the stuff that it came with. If you want to buy a different adapter u can just look on the Internet (what is an hdmi adapter), and it will show one up for like 8 bucks.All and all its a great chair and I very much recommend it for people that game for hours at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible stand and bottom seat.
customer_reviews.text: Alright. I'll start with the speakers are good. Back of the chair is comfy. Now. The bottom. Lacks cushion. The bar hits the back of the thighs. But what I am very displeased about is the pedistal stand. It is the noisest thing ever. Even brand new . If creaked. It has only gotten worse. Has gotten to the point my wife complains about the squeaking and creaking. I am very displeased .
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Stompanato

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chair but had an issue with speaker
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great, easy to assemble and functions well; other than one small speaker toward the top has some "scratchy" sounds that occur all the time. I've been too lazy however to bother checking the wiring or calling support yet (which is why I've still given a great review). I will and will update this review soon.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Marino-Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Would never buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: Worst Chair I have ever owned. As a computer gamer, I thought it would be cool to have one of these chairs that I could sit in at my desk, it ended up having little to no padding at the bridge of the legs and is terrible for gaming. The arms suck, the padding sucks, the immobility sucks and the buzzing from the speakers suck.
customer_reviews.author: D.W.

customer_reviews.title: Great chair with great features
customer_reviews.text: Great chair with great features. I've had it about 3 months now. One downfall, maybe two depending on how crucial you are. Vibration feature kinda suck in my opinion but also the main gripe that most users experience....That board across the upper front part of the seat starts to stick out more as the cushion gets more compressed. I now have to put a cushion when sitting, depending on how long i sit in it for. On the bright side, i use the wireless mode, pretty efficient, no noticeable lag between audio and video playback. Easy to assemble and lightweight enough to move around.
customer_reviews.author: X. Raymore

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable...look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Item is small and not very comfortable. It seems like it would be o.k. for a small child, but not meant for adults. No support for back and arm rest sit low. Not meant for long periods of time, which is odd due to the fact that it's a gaming chair and that what it is supposed to be designed for...basically, would not recommend and not at that price. If you're are planning on spending that much money, you can you buy a decent recliner or some other quality made furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Medic0513

customer_reviews.title: So So
customer_reviews.text: I'm six feet and one inch so what I am about to say is predicated with that. My shoulders are about even with the top of the back of the chair. This means the chair is too small but it weighs a good twenty to twenty five pounds is bulky and really inconvenient to return because I don't own a truck. As far as comfort, it's okay for about two hours but after that it gets a little hard. The range of the lean back is practically nil. Those are the negative things about tbe chair. The positive thing is the blue tooth stereo sound. I expected more for $230.0!
customer_reviews.author: Pentimento

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of timeline
customer_reviews.text: We got this and pulled out all of the boxing and protective pieces It took 30 minutes to break down a shit ton of unnecessary boxing and all of the packaging. We couldn’t even fit it all of it in (2)32 gallon trash cans. We cant even throw away anything else. Not good. This is beside the actual product review. The sound on the chair is extremely poor All you hear is static. Poor product and especially poor for $150.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: It looks good but doesn't feel really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It's a lovely looking chair but it's not really comfortable I noticed some back paid after sitting on it for some long hours. I'm about 6" 195 But i discovered a trick.....put a soft throw pillow on it before you sit and try to adjust till you fill comfortable...I usually have mine go a bit under my thighs so I could rest my back....and also this helps save the leather from cracks..I've had mine for a while now and it still looks super new, no cracks ...
customer_reviews.author: Manic

customer_reviews.title: You VS the ROCK!
customer_reviews.text: You only hear from me when I have something to say.......and I have something to say..... If you're looking for a comfortable, pliable chair....keep looking. This thing is as hard as a leather wrapped ROCK! Does it sound Good? YES. Does it look Good? YES. Does it have a multitude of connection options? YES. But if you expect to spend a couple of hours, sitting back enjoying your favorite game or the latest murder mystery on Blu-ray, I seriously doubt it. And I don't have much hope it will soften with use and time. Chances are, just like a ROCK, this will last a long time....BUT will you want it to? ROCK on.......
customer_reviews.author: I.M. Man

customer_reviews.title: I ReMEBER  Remember when!!!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't looked at it yet but my Miss Cleo 976 Physic Powers off the charts trght now. I am currently unavailable.... at the Present I am floating through the air with my new friend who happens to be an old freind I guess I was to shy or afraid to get Laid cause now I feel what I would call real love... the kind that grabs you right before the end and your says you ain't going no whefe friend... I am right there with you and all always will be. UNTIL THAT ONE AQUINTANUCE OF OURS, Comes calling.... WE CAN See or hear bit can always feel him pulling us down...
customer_reviews.author: Professional Butter Passer

customer_reviews.title: 8 Month Review- Non Rocking, no padding and smelly
customer_reviews.text: 8 months review - I purchased for my 14 year old son who games (of note he is 115 pounds). This chair has ZERO padding in the seat area and is sunken in around the wood or what ever is used to construct it. It has never rocked and due to the multiple wired set up he does not use the speakers (his choice, not because the speakers do not work) . Lastly, the chair smells, granted teenage boys smell, but the fabric holds the smell and no matter what you do it does not go away.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you are taller than 5'8
customer_reviews.text: The chair seemed to be of good quality; however, if you are tall, you will not fit in this chair. I am 5'8 and I fit perfectly. My husband is 6'0 and this didn't fit him at all. His head was not supported and he could not sit normally and have his arms sit on the armrest. If you are any taller than 5'8, I would not buy this chair. They need to put adjustable headrest and armrests and it would be perfect! (We didn't hook up speakers, so I couldn't tell you the quality of that)
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my 15 year old son for Christmas, bear in mind this boy is all of 100lbs wet. In less than a month the seat is sunken in and he sitting on wood. I will contact product support to see what they have to say then follow up with this review, but as of right now this chair is not worth the price so save your money.
customer_reviews.author: PCR&R

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable at all!
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable seat. Feels like you are sitting on a piece of wood or metal. Poor construction. Also the fact that it needs to be plugged in and doesn't offer a wireless charging capability makes it annoying. The chair swivels which in turn means the cord gets wrapped around the chair and ends up being pulled out or damages the connectors. Poor design for a pre teen to use for gaming as they will swivel in the chair.
customer_reviews.author: A Evans

customer_reviews.title: No customer support
customer_reviews.text: This chair was perfect for my boyfriend for about 4 months and then the base of the chair started getting loose and now pieces of the frame that holds the chair in place is breaking off which is causing our toddler to find the pieces it does sound good and we love the chair until it started getting wobbly and breaking into small pieces I would contact the sales but it won't let you on here so that maybe we could get our problem fixed
customer_reviews.author: Jerrah

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair, audio needs work.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Comfortable. Audio cut out during certain games for no discernible reason. The cheaper version of this chair never had an issue, it just wasn’t as comfortable. We did return this for another model, which had the same issues related to the audio signal. We were at least able to work around it using the headphone jack on the updated model. Would be great if it worked properly!
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this chair
customer_reviews.text: I really like this chair.. the speakers are not the best but they are loud. the wireless dongle sucks the life right out of the batteries. so it is best you look for a power adapter if you plan on using the speakers for any length of time. a lot of people complained about the bar going across I do notice it if i think about it but it doesn't hurt or annoy me in any way. I wish it wasn't so low. and I wish the arm rests were a little more sturdy. nothing a little tightening cant fix.
customer_reviews.author: crowstew

customer_reviews.title: Purchase chair 2 separate times due to pedestal breaking
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves this chair. I purchased one about 4 years ago and the after about 2 years the pedestal broke. I purchased chair again and within 2 years that pedestal broke. Husband absolutely loves this chair, now I'm searching for replacement pedestal. Husband is 5'11 and 210 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: ThatLAchick

customer_reviews.title: X ROCKER
customer_reviews.text: I search all around for a gaming chair and boom We found this one cheaper than a high priced chair but a lot more comfortable and it has three speakers that crank and vibrates to the game. Head rest, rocker... Has a bunch of ports only one missing is a USB otherwise this X ROCKER it GREAT!!!! A+A+A+
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The electronic/technology portion of chair difficult to install. The chair does not come equipped with any technology to facilitate communication with other gamers. Essentially it allows for a comfortable seat, low level sound/vibration but you still have to wear a headset while sitting in chair to communicate with other gamers. There is no point in having sound through speakers if you have to wear a headset while seated in chair. Better off just purchasing a comfortable chair to sit in. Last but not least, the faux leather chair covering ripped in less than. 1 month after delivery of item. Very disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: copple

customer_reviews.title: Not a chair for serious gamers!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is way behind in technology and quality than the majority of mainstream gaming chairs. I guess those giving it “good” ratings don’t actually game for hours! It’s hard to adjust. It doesn’t have rollers or move. It’s stiff. Doesn’t have good head support or lumbar support. Overall was a waist of money. Wouldn’t recommend it. And basically I’m going to have to buy another chair and put this one in the garage until I can pawn it off on someone.
customer_reviews.author: TexasCountryPride

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this chair but boy was I disappointed. After 15 mins. of playing video games the front of the seat cushion was digging into the back of my legs and the piping on the seat cushion digging into my bottom. I am 5'8" and 220. I think that the frame under the cushion needs some serious work. After a couple hours the speakers started cutting out and then quit all together after a more couple hours later. Highly disappointed still looking for a good gaming chair.
customer_reviews.author: Craig J. Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Bad first time, 2nd better
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her gameing chair she uses it everyday First time we had to get a replacement because they sent us a used one That was broken like they accidentally sent us a used one without checking the box once we got the new one in it was definitely much better and worked! Worth the 180
customer_reviews.author: Iorn madain

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor build material quality.
customer_reviews.text: The chairs internal padding foam has dissolved after 6 months of NORMAL use. We purchased 2 of these chairs in December of 2019 as Christmas gifts. As of July 2020, they no longer have ANY foam padding that can be felt in the bottom/back portion of either of the 2 chairs. The outer vinyl material is intact and undamaged but the internal padding is now nonexistent and this has made the chairs extremely uncomfortable and thus useable. Again, this was under normal use with about 130lb users, the chairs were well taken care of and nothing has been broken or damaged on either of the two chairs. Warranty on these chairs was only 90 days from date of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chair but slightly over priced.
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad as far as putting it together. The bass sounds good and thumps pretty good. There are many ways to connect to your TV or output source. The durability seems to be a lot better than the less expensive ones. But for the price is seems like the quality good be a little better. Don't get me wrong it is a good piece of equipment but at this price point this is considered furniture and not a toy. Real leather would be nice. If you make it they will buy it even if cost a little more money.
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair ford kid/younger teen
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 10 yr old for his birthday. Seems sturdy enough for a younger kid or teen, possibly even a smaller adult. I'm a bigger guy, so I would destroy it. Unfortunately I have seen cheaper ones at Walmart. Problem that I have is you need a longer power cord. The one that comes with it is really short. Very easy set up, 1 or 2 holes for the arm rests weren't quite inline with each other. I went with this one because of the stand. Materials don't feel cheap. Think if I had looked harder, maybe could have gotten a better price. All that being said, the kid loves it, and hasn't destroyed it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: This is a great gaming chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gaming chair. I also own the X Rocker commander, it is still comfortable but lacks the seat cushioning that the pro provides. I am 6'1" and 265 lbs and both the X Rocker Pro and Commander can support my weight. Just do not use the arm rests to get out of the chair, It has a warning in the instruction manual about that. The sound is really nice and loud, the vibration function is ok but more of a gimmick. My only complaint is that the back could be higher. Also these do rotate and recline.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: My family loves the chair! We ended up not using the pedestal and went rocker style with the attached rails. This is one of the few chairs that allows the option for rocker and pedestal. After doing some research and reading reviews, I purchased a longer power cable and HDMI to RCA converter for connection to the TV. The raised padding provides added comfort and style. A little pricey, but provided the features we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Plenty Loud with Vibrations
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty impressed by the quality of this gadget. I have my PS4 controller wired to it with a 3.5mm audio cord. I haven't tried the wireless box this chair comes with yet. I would like there to be more vibration at lower sound levels....(my Wife doesn't need to "hear" how much fun I am having but I would like to feel the revs when playing Gran Turismo Sport. Pick this baby up if you want to sit like the gamer you are. Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Jinksed

customer_reviews.title: Might need extra cushions
customer_reviews.text: The chair is ok. I'm 6 ft and I fit ok in it. However, the chair is really hard. It only has cushioned areas where the head leans and in the buttocks area, still not very supportive. Too much time playing in it and I would end up with a sore back and hips. I was ready to get rid of this chair until I added two cushions to it. One for my back and one for my butt. After that, the chair is passable to play in it for hours at a time with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Paisa

customer_reviews.title: Why dont they use bluetooth instead of so many wires?
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble but not comfortable at all and the speakers arent that good and there are so many wires and it's made with 90s tech with the white and red audio input
customer_reviews.author: Tallen Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this product for a week now and it's not exactly the most comfortable chair . Also the wireless function for audio only works sometimes. The arm rests might as well not even be there as they're not remotely tall enough for anyone over the age of 5 and they often get in the way of your thighs. Also my product leans to the left side on level ground. Overall would NOT recommend
customer_reviews.author: TRISTAN

customer_reviews.title: I finally gave up and did the easy headphone jack to controller route and it is super ...
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews but figured I could make it work but this thing just wont connect the audio. I finally gave up and did the easy headphone jack to controller route and it is super quiet. I google my problems and there seems to be so many people having the same problems. I just wish I had spent the amount of money I spent on extra cables and adapters on a better chair.
customer_reviews.author: thisguy

customer_reviews.title: A really good buy for the gamer in your life
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my husband. So far he loves it. Didn’t take long for him to put it together or get the sound connected to his PS4 (had to watch YouTube videos for sound). The gaming sounds great coming from the chair. I also bought him a black ottoman so he could put his feet up. So if you're buying this for an adult I suggest getting a cheap ottoman if you don’t already have one. But overall this is a great comfortable chair. It looks nice and my husband is satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The seat doesn't have enough padding for hours of gaming
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two my daughter and her boyfriend. Christmas 2019. They really like the chairs they are in their gaming room. ONLY complaint and I did my research the seat padding breaks down less then a month. I knew this as I had read reviews, but had hoped they had fixed this flaw. Sadly it has not been fixed. I don't know how to let them know.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Kaido

customer_reviews.title: Maybe look at other chairs
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two as a Christmas gift. Very disappointing. The chair creaks very loudly. The audio does not sound great, after a couple of months the audio stopped completely. Overall the chair seems to be poorly constructed and does not feel sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: chrissouth

customer_reviews.title: Useless, and total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Useless, and total waste of money. Within less than 6 months the pedestal broke. Piece of junk now. Bought another chair. This is the third chair from Ace and all of them suck. Will NOT be using their product again.
customer_reviews.author: anamika

customer_reviews.title: Oh my god it's awesome. The directions with connecting the chair to my ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god it's awesome. The directions with connecting the chair to my system was a little convoluted and confusing. It kept saying I needed a yellow wire. I didn't. I just connected the green=red/white chord to the connectors, then to the double red/white chord. Then connected the green to my tv's audio out and the red/white wire to the chair. I'm pretty sure that's confusing, but I don't really have diagrams to show what I mean. Either way, this chair is going to be difficult to get out of. Building it was a breeze and its heavy enough to be sturdy, but light enough to be moved on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Alter_Ego

customer_reviews.title: Amazing chair for sweatshop labor
customer_reviews.text: Chair is great for the most part the chair itself well made sturdy loud sounds plays great. The 4 star rating is because of the accessories are garbage. Do yourself a favor and buy a 12ft+ 3.5 male to male aux cord and connect it from your tv headphone jack to the MP3 player jack in the chair than everything that plays through your t.v (I'm running PS4 Xbox 1 and a mi box) and with the cord upgrade the sound is much clearer. Chair⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Accessories with the chair: take them to the sweatshop they came from and strangle the dude who thought these were some form of quality oh wait they would just break
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different chair
customer_reviews.text: It broke within a week of being assembled. Customer service sent half of the parts we needed. We have waited months with a broken chair for the rest of the parts we need to repair it. When I check in with customer service all they tell me is it is back ordered and they will have it in soon. Meanwhile I paid for a useless chair. Save yourself the hassle and buy a different chair.
customer_reviews.author: April B

customer_reviews.title: Assembled poorly
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for a Christmas present. I am an engineer and putting this together is a nightmare when the pin holes in the back dont line up to get the pin through. Its poorly constructed and not sure if its the best quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: MElissa Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment....Husband Loves the Chair
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the chair as an anniversary gift for my husband and was nervous that it would not fit his needs. But he loves it. He says it was easy to assemble although he had some issues with the Bluetooth connection. He was able to connect directly to the TV with no problems. Very comfortable with a leather feel. The speakers are awesome. When he is playing his games I can hear and feel the bass upstairs (it has volume control). You also feel the vibrations from the gameplay. He even relaxes in it when watching Sports center all day. Very well made. Sturdy and my husband is 6'1 and fits comfortably. I would recommend for your gamer.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Reid

customer_reviews.title: Technical Support Absent
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is good when it works. The problem is when it doesn’t work as mine did not pass the sound through. The technical support is not Amazon, and it was Ace. I placed 2 calls with no return call until a week later, after I had taken the chair apart and fixed the issue myself. In other words, no timely Technical Support.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Decent chair.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and the speakers are decent, but if you’re a big and tall guy like me, you might wanna skip this one. For a quick game it’s okay, but for prolonged gaming, it kills my back. Had to leave the arm rests off because they dig into my legs.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: ... since it's elevated through the pedestal The installation is easy enough. I just which they could have literally ...
customer_reviews.text: This is no where near the comfortability as the one without the pedestal The material on this one is harder and the seated area seems smaller than the other one The other one is really low which makes sitting down and getting up a real pain in the knee and the lower back but this one doesn't have that problem since it's elevated through the pedestal The installation is easy enough. I just which they could have literally just drilled some holes in the other one and make it with a pedestal...sigh
customer_reviews.author: RatherHonest

customer_reviews.title: A great chair but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair as far as sound quality and material. It is also very easy to assemble. The chair took me a good 20 minutes to put together, and for the most part, I can see how a healthy person would be satisfied with it. The only negative thing about this chair is that if you are a gamer and have developed back problems, (i.e. kyphosis, bulging disc, etc.) you may want to re-evaluate your purchase. The chair does not have any type of support for the mid to lower back.
customer_reviews.author: StormgalNYC

customer_reviews.title: Very good but has some audio issues.
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put together, just a little time consuming. its really comfy! Its just that the cheap remote/channel connector it comes with is really flimsy and it took us a long time to figure out the audio. For a while we were hearing constant static in the background. It was really frustrating but overall it was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Kershaw

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled, it's not as good as it looks.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about two years. It's not very comfortable, if you're using it on the stand. The angle just doesn't feel right. The arm rests aren't adjustable. The speakers are good, but running them wireless is pointless. The wireless transmitter requires batteries and you still need to plug the chair in with a power cable (so you might as well just run a sound cable too). It doesn't work well with an office desk. I think I've only held on to it for this long, because of how much $$ it cost. I didn't want to feel like I had made a bad purchase. Don't be fooled by the glamour. It's not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, comfortable chair
customer_reviews.text: Chair arrived a couple of days earlier than predicted which was just fine. From delivery to the front door by UPS, through unpacking, to assmbly took only a little over half an hour. Assembly was easy. Setting up the electronics took a little longer. The chair is comfortable for me, 5'9" & 185#. For watching TV I'm going to add a foot rest/ottoman for total comfort. Sound is good. You'll need two AAA batteries for the transmitter for wireless to the chair. Happy with my purchase Additional comment: 10-30-2013 some reviewers have mentioned the need for more padding in the seat. Well they're right. It's not exactly uncomfortable for me, but more padding is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Brer Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Not very safe
customer_reviews.text: This chair was fairly easy to assemble. However we lifted the chair and the bottom metal plate fell on my sons foot and hitting husbands leg. Not very secure and safe. They were left in pain and with bruises. The excitement of the chair was then lost.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Calvillo

customer_reviews.title: ... on YouTube claimed that the X-Pro 300 was a better chair than this
customer_reviews.text: A reviewer on YouTube claimed that the X-Pro 300 was a better chair than this. Well, after having bought both of them, he's dead wrong. The X-Pro has better arms, but this chair has wireless audio to your TV, a rumble motor, better sounding speakers (but the X-Pro was close) and is IMO overall more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but very short lifespan
customer_reviews.text: I've had this chair for a little over a year, and in the first few weeks the "pleather" on the seat started to crack and a few months later the seat buckled. It's still usable, but it looks horrible. I've never hooked it to my audio system, so don't know if it's good or bad. Anyway, it seems that it's time to buy a new chair. I don't think it's gonna be any of the X Rocker chairs :(
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry Nikiforov

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY! Awesome Sound , easy to set-up
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best gift my fiance got this year for Christmas. It has great sounds quality and you can control settings right from the chair. It is very simple to hook up to the PS4 and Tv. Great for gaming, movies and TV. The chair is very sturdy. Super is easy to build and adjust. The lower back support is the only comfort missing, but adding a small pillow for your lower back makes it very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this chair Bought this chair for my son. We could not get the sound to work with our tv. We had an older tv so we decided to buy a new tv. It has been over 1 month and we still have not gotten the chair to work with either tv. It works with the iPad and that is about it. Support is almost non existent
customer_reviews.author: Judith of Tucson

customer_reviews.title: nice chair but kinda cheapy
customer_reviews.text: easy to install , too much wires , first week having it , it started to make creaking sounds , tried to return they basically said i couldnt so i just made the best out of it , im 6’1 my shoulders are at the head rest wouldnt sugest if ur my hieght or taller to buy look into something else if your my height or taller
customer_reviews.author: Hunter J.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and bass
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and bass, the vibration function really ties it all together. Its good for gaming but it really shines just listening to music and can be very loud. It can be comfortable but I tend to have to change positions because the foam is not the greatest. I can get long 10-12 hour sessions in with minor stretches. Overall very good product, the audio is really what does it for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee A.

customer_reviews.title: Great chair...suspect Power Supply!
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old son loves this chair...it was a Christmas present. However, the included power supply is supposed to supply 12 VDC and the power supply either failed or originally only supplied 8.8 VDC. (approximately 9VDC)...similar to the situation in another post regarding this chair. I contacted the Seller/Amazon and they were more than willing to correct the issue...However, I specifically requested ONLY a replacement power supply. I have a very strong suspicion that I will receive an entire new chair and power supply! Other than this minor issue...My son loves this chair!
customer_reviews.author: Big Smooth

customer_reviews.title: Super happy.
customer_reviews.text: Both my roommate and I bought a chair. I was really happy with it, my roommate is a bigger guy 6 ft 230lbs and he fit just fine. Im a smaller guy 5'7 130 so obviously its perfect for me. Once the sound was set up in the chair , my roommate and I can set up the chair next to each other and with one switch sync the chairs together for an even better experience!
customer_reviews.author: Derek T

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this and it said it would have minor ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and it said it would have minor cosmetic damage. It can with the handle busted in half and the pieces that connect the pedestal to the chair were broken. That’s a little more than cosmetic damage! Anyway I was able to repair the pedestal and can use it. I will say that the chair is comfortable ! I’m giving theee stars because it came on time and the functions worked. I prob wouldn’t have paid as much for it if it said the arm rests were snapped in half.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Most uncomfortable chair ever!
customer_reviews.text: It is so sleek looking that we really had high hopes for this chair but alas, it is the most uncomfortable chair either of us ever did sit upon and we returned it from where it came rapidly.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. He loves the chair, but he would rather use the TV sound instead of built-in speakers. The speakers are placed so that the sound is harder to hear in a large room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: The chair is ok in comfort, is better when you have something to prop your feet on. Sound is unbelievable. When I purchased the chair, the plan was to continue to use my surround sound and not the chair speakers. After trying it, I packed up the surround sound and now only use the chair speakers. I have a PS4 and run the speakers off of the controller. It is very simple to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Chair creaks super loud when you sit in it. Ordering replacement.
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this chair for my husband for Father’s Day. It arrived on time and was quickly and easily assembled. The chair sits comfortably and the audio features are better than I would have expected. However, the chair seemed to be leaning slightly and makes an obnoxiously loud creaking noise each time someone sits in it or shifts their weight even slightly. I believe the one we received must be defective because we had not seen this problem mentioned in any reviews. Ordering a replacement and returning the defective one. Hopefully it was an isolated issue and the replacement will be noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair.
customer_reviews.text: I read few bad reviews before buying this chair and I still decided to give it a shot. Honestly I don't regret it. The sound on the speakers is not like Super expensive high quality sound but if you're looking for a sound like that get you some Astro Headphones the A50 are a good investment. going back to the chair the Quality is very good, The sound is good too. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair for the price and dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Great chair, don't listen to the whiners complain about their rear end rather than the chair. The sound and vibration and comfort are decent for the price point and dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: Crow D

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase...
customer_reviews.text: Quick to assemble, wireless hookup to Logitech speaker headset jack, comfortable, looks great. I use it for Trainz Game & it sounds very good. Vibration is neat, too...
customer_reviews.author: John Rowley

customer_reviews.title: I'm a pretty light guy at 125lbs
customer_reviews.text: I'm a pretty light guy at 125lbs. This chairs cushioning is completely gone after just a year. The rest of the materials held up fine but it's like sitting on a rock, you can actually feel a support in the middle of the seat which is really uncomfortable. I can't imagine how bad this chair must be for anyone with a bigger build.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Nadolny

customer_reviews.title: First impression - nice chair. After it's assembled and my son is ...
customer_reviews.text: First impression - nice chair. After it's assembled and my son is trying to connect to his xbox one - NO GOOD. Does not work with xbox one. You need to buy another component to make it work - I guess. I have no idea what I need to buy now to make it work as advertised. BIG let down. Not happy at all. If you buy this chair and you expect it to work out of the box then think again.
customer_reviews.author: Rastamon

customer_reviews.title: A great chair, untill.......
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chair in April 2019 as a replacement for our daughters worn out 'Wally' chair she had for a couple of years. Guess what? It looks like I'll be heading back to who-knows-where soon as this 'wonder' chair has several rips and tears in the seat! One would think, for $200.00, it would have lasted more than a year.
customer_reviews.author: CMH

customer_reviews.title: Poor business. Incomplete order and no help from the company
customer_reviews.text: Came with no bolts, power cord, or any cords that it states are included. No book, directions and when i called both Amazon and company i am sitting in this chair with no audio. It doesnt work and got zero help. Thanks for the leather dud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Our son absolutely loves this chair. It is super easy to assemble, ties into the TV wirelessly and effortlessly, and has really amazing sound and vibration.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Carver

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: very durable, i have a very active young gamer and he loves this chair. The sound quality is incredible and its easy to hook up. we have not yet figured out wireless
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. I use this mainly with "World of Tanks" and it really adds to the experience. Good volume once you realize the volume control is the big "X" logo in the middle of the control box. Like almost everyone else mentions, the armrests could use some padding and some adjustability. If you're a bigger guy the armrests are pretty much useless (low and to far back) but the seat holds up fairly well. Again, I could find a "better" chair, but I'm not willing to pay a lot just for gaming use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Roberson

customer_reviews.title: otherwise its not bad, maybe a touch short but not much
customer_reviews.text: no way to use this with a new xbox one. this doesnt come with any HDMI connection. so i hope you got the red and white cable version.. more than a lot pissed that such a simple thing is not part of the design. otherwise its not bad, maybe a touch short but not much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... gift for myself and unfortunately it didn't turn out like I hoped
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for myself and unfortunately it didn't turn out like I hoped. The set up was nice and easy and once assembled the chair felt nice and comfortable. But there was one major problem: the speakers popped. A LOT. At first I thought it was because the volume was too loud but quickly realized this was not the case. I tried multiple volumes and different games and they popped on all of them. From the reviews I've read seems there's a lot of people who didn't have this problem (lucky!) but unfortunately for me it didn't work out and I'm gonna have to give it a low score.
customer_reviews.author: Seanthings

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Transmitter INTERMEDIAN ISSUE. No support from Xrocker tech
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great. The only problem was the wireless connection. The Wireless transmitter kept shutting off after 5 min when using the batteries. To fix this issue i had to buy AC wireless adaptor for the wireless transmitter extra $20 on ebay. I call and email xrocker technical support which was useless. There is no technical/ or customer support for this company so be aware of that. Right now chair is comfortable and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Cedeno

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair overall with some issues
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair although probably should be priced $100 lower. The folding hinge is flimsy. The chair stays up fine but knocks down easily. The seat could dip a bit more or recline to be more comfortable. The wireless transmitter is really cheap. I put 2 AAA batteries in it and it heated up quite quickly so I removed the batteries, burning my thumb in the process. At this price point I would have like a little better quality, especially with the wireless charger.
customer_reviews.author: Rorqual

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair! Speaker have a really good sound. I got this as a birthday gift for my fiance. He absolutely loves it. I posted the pics on Facebook and within a few hours, we had his friends coming over to check it out. They will be ordering one as well. It got here a day early, so I was very pleased with the shipping and the quality of the chair!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Boudreaux

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made,
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my grandson, he is only weigh 102 lbs. we haven’t had it not even a year and the seat is coming apart. This is the second one we have bought. The first one did the same thing. It’s not like he is rough on it he is a special need child. I would not Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn edwards

customer_reviews.title: Xrocker pro ceries ROCKS ( model# 51396)
customer_reviews.text: Great product in my opinion... i ise it often and its a comfortable chart, the speakers are loud and the vibration setting works impressively and i often plug up my cell or tablet to it and enjoy sitting in it and listening to music...i purchased my chair 12/2015 and i have to say my seats padding is holding up very well and it does tilt inlike other post that state this chair does not tilt. What they should state is that there's no lever that locks in you tilted angle in place. Iverall i enjoy this and would recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: N.J.F.

customer_reviews.title: Do. Not. Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I've never spend so much money on a chair only to be this disappointed. It HURTS! Its like sitting on lumpy hard plastic. The support under the thighs cut off my circulation. I wish I could return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Gehle

customer_reviews.title: Son loves the chair
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my son, he loves it. I did let it "air out" once it was unboxed (for about 3-4 days). Easy to put together and he seems to love it. I don't game so I don't sit it in, but my pups love it too and they don't mind jumping up on it when its not being occupied.
customer_reviews.author: Lady TCL

product_meta.title: X Rocker Pro Series 2.1 Vibrating Black Leather Foldable Video Gaming Chair with Pedestal Base and Headrest for Adult, Teen, and Kid Gamers - High Tech Audio and Wireless Capacity - Ergonomic Back Support
product_meta.description: Size:51396 ProWelcome to the world of interactive audio! Regular and professional gamers alike can now not only hear sounds of the game, but actually feel it with the X Rocker Pro Series Pedestal 2.1 Video Gaming Chair. Whether you are listening to music, watching a movie, or playing a game, you will become a part of the excitement. The X Rocker Pro Series game rocker has two speakers hidden in the head rest and a subwoofer that uses Ace Bayou's innovative Audio Force Modulation Technology. This places speakers and ported power subwoofers into the open space - not just the frame - within the X Rocker to magnify sound quality and intensify your experience. The X Rocker Pro H3 also has additional vibration motors that sync with your audio's bass tones to create an even more powerful full-body sensation. The supportive base elevates you and allows you to tilt and swivel for hours of comfort while the gunstock armrests, ergonomic design, and head rest provide extra back and neck support. Control panel includes separate volume and bass controls, and input and output jacks for connecting to your audio source and to other X Rockers for multi-player games. The wireless receiver is built-in and the box includes your wireless transmitter that will send audio from any source with headset or RCA outputs to your gaming chair. Optional RCA cables also included. Some assembly required - allen wrench included.
feature_bullets: ALL PURPOSE PEDESTAL GAMING CHAIR: Leather lounging game chair can be used for playing video games, watching movies and TV, listening to music, reading, and relaxing.

COMPLETE MEDIA EXPERIENCE: Chair incorporates two forward facing speakers, audio force modulation technology, and ported power subwoofers into the open space inside the chair for full immersion in your game, movie, or music.

ADDITIONAL VIBRATION MOTORS: The Pro Series H3 includes additional vibration motors that sync with your audio's bass tones to create an even more powerful full-body sensation keeping you comfortable and entertained for hours.
RADIO WIRELESS RECEIVER: Built-in radio wireless receiver and included wireless transmitter work with any source with RCA stereo outputs; optional RCA cables included
COMPATIBILITY: Compatible with Xbox, PlayStation, and all other gaming systems.

CONNECTS WITH MULTIPLE CHAIRS: Control panel includes separate volume and bass controls, and input and output jacks for connecting to your audio source so other X-Rocker chairs can join in multi-game mode.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars2,729 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
